Package BackEnd

Class ShopDatabase

java.lang.Object
BackEnd.ShopDatabase
public class ShopDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
Exercise 1 Code
Since:
Oct 9th, 2020 Sources: Code requirements from assignment Description: ShopDB holds an inventory of items and allows for queries to be made to that list. Duplicate items are not allowed (based on item ID)
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nathan Jack

      public void checkQty​(java.lang.String input)
      Returns current quantity of input item
      Parameters:

    • decreaseItem

      public void decreaseItem​(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String qty)
      Decrease qty of item in inventory by 1 or by user input value.
      Parameters:
      input - Item name or ID.
      qty - Quantity to reduce by.

    • searchByName

      public void searchByName​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Prints item information of item in database based on passed item name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - Tool name of item to be found.

    • searchByID

      public void searchByID​(java.lang.String ID)
      Prints item information of item in database based on passed item ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - Tool ID of item to be found

    • returnItem

      public Item returnItem​(java.lang.String input)
      Helper function. Returns Item object from inventory.
      Parameters:
      input - Tool ID or Name to be returned.
      Returns:
      returns Item if found in inventory or null.

    • generateOrderID

      public int generateOrderID​(java.lang.String input)
      Generates unit hash ID based on todays date and tool ID. Hash ID is unique to the inputs. ie same inputs = same hashID
      Parameters:
      input - Item name or ID to return Item from inventory
      Returns:
      returns 5 digit unique order ID
